user.title: Setup
user.description: Setup your core settings. Full documentation can be found at https://bottlecapdave.github.io/HomeAssistant-OctopusEnergy/setup/core

target_rate.title: Setup Target Rate
target_rate.description: Setup a target rate period. Continuous target will find the lowest intensity within a combined period for your target hours. While intermittent will find the periods with the lowest intensity with potential gaps, which when combined will meet your target hours. Full documentation can be found at https://bottlecapdave.github.io/HomeAssistant-OctopusEnergy/setup/target_rate

data.name: The name of your target
data.type: The type of target you're after
data.start_time: The minimum time to start the device
data.end_time: The maximum time to stop the device
data.offset: The offset to apply to the scheduled block to be considered active

error.invalid_target_hours: Target hours must be in half hour increments.
error.invalid_target_name: Name must only include lower case alpha characters and underscore (e.g. my_target)
error.invalid_target_time: Must be in the format HH:MM
error.invalid_offset: Offset must be in the form of HH:MM:SS with an optional negative symbol

abort.not_supported: Configuration for target rates is not supported at the moment.
